page.title: 07KNOTTINGLEY B.M.X. TRACK
page.content: The B.M.X. track is next to our school with the school fence separating them. {It was built in 1984 and attracts {competitors from all over the North of {England}to race meetings,which are held every Tuesday and fortnightly on a Sunday during the racing season. On arrival competitors have to register and have their bike checked for safety.{All racers must wear {protective clothing.}Racing is done in age groups and when competitors are called they must go to the top of the start hill.Races are started with the words,"Riders ready.Pedals ready.Go!" The gate drops and the race begins. Track Marshalls stand on each corner and hold up a green flag for a clear track and a red flag if an accident occurs.When all the races have been completed there is a trophy presentation to race winners.
